FuncDef: The display affinity-mapping command displays information about an affinity name template.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the affinity name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view information about an affinity name template, run the display affinity-mapping command. The command output includes the bit mapped to a specified name, information about a link using the bit name, and information about MPLS TE tunnels passing through the link.
